channel.description: Better nannying for North Carolina starts here!

image.title: Craft – North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies

item.title: (triangle) Valentines Day Craft – Two Locations/Days
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Levenbook
item.description: Join volunteer craft leader, and social chair, Laura for a Valentine’s Day craft. You will have two opportunities in the Triangle! Date and Time: February 6th at 11 am Location: Cary Towne Center Food Court @ 1105 Walnut St, Ste 200, Cary, North Carolina 27511 RSVP: We are collecting RSVPs via Facebook and through emails […]
item.content:encoded:
Join volunteer craft leader, and social chair, Laura for a Valentine’s Day craft. You will have two opportunities in the Triangle!

Date and Time: February 6th at 11 am

Location: Cary Towne Center Food Court @ 1105 Walnut St, Ste 200, Cary, North Carolina 27511

RSVP: We are collecting RSVPs via Facebook and through emails to social chair Laura. Facebook RSVPs are only available to current North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies members. If emailing, please include the event date or location so Laura can ensure proper supplies.

Date and Time: February 7th at 11 am

Location: The Streets at Southpoint Food Court @ 6910 Fayetteville Rd, Durham, North Carolina 27713

RSVP: We are collecting RSVPs via Facebook, Facebook Private Group, and through emails to social chair Laura. Facebook Private Group RSVPs are only available to current North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies members. If emailing, please include the event date or location so Laura can ensure proper supplies.

item.title: (triangle) July 4th Craft
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Levenbook
item.description: Event Title: (triangle) July 4th Craft Date and Time: June 29th at 11 am Location: Chapel Hill Community Center, 120 S Estes Dr, Chapel Hill, NC 27514, USA Come join us as we craft our way into the Fourth of July. This craft will be at most 10 minutes out of a larger playdate. Bring a picnic […]
item.content:encoded:
Event Title: (triangle) July 4th Craft

Date and Time: June 29th at 11 am

Location: Chapel Hill Community Center, 120 S Estes Dr, Chapel Hill, NC 27514, USA

Come join us as we craft our way into the Fourth of July.

This craft will be at most 10 minutes out of a larger playdate. Bring a picnic lunch and join us for craft, play, and food!

RSVP: We are collecting RSVPs via Facebook, MeetUp, and through emails to rsvp@ncpan.org. Links for Facebook and MeetUp are provided below. RSVPs are necessary to ensure appropriate numbers of craft supplies so please mention the number of toddlers you will be bringing.

Facebook @ https://www.facebook.com/events/1929725923938606/

MeetUp @ https://www.meetup.com/The-Research-Triangle-Area-Caregiver-and-Nanny-Support-Group/events/240943848/

item.title: (triangle) [Follow Up] Toddler Craft
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Levenbook
item.description: Look at how cute the Valentines Wreaths are! Volunteer member nanny Laura did an amazing job putting this together, didn’t she? A complete set of images from the event has been sent to attendees. If you attended and didn’t receive the link to the full image set, please contact webmaster@ncpan.org. If you have images to […]
item.content:encoded:
Look at how cute the Valentines Wreaths are!

Volunteer member nanny Laura did an amazing job putting this together, didn’t she?

A complete set of images from the event has been sent to attendees. If you attended and didn’t receive the link to the full image set, please contact webmaster@ncpan.org. If you have images to add, please send them to webmaster@ncpan.org.

~~~

ARCHIVED DETAILS FOR THE CURIOUS

Event Title: (triangle) Toddler Craft

Date and Time: February 9th at 10 am

Location: Southpoint Mall Food Court (6910 Fayetteville Road , Durham, NC 27713)

item.title: (triangle) Nanny Night Out: Paint + Sip

item.description: Event Title: (triangle) Nanny Night Out: Paint + Sip Date and Time: March 3rd at 6:30 pm Location: Pinot’s Palette, 10410 Moncreiffe Rd #101, Raleigh, NC 27617, USA Description Arrive at 6:30 pm so that we are on time for the program start at 7 pm. Cost $35, payable to business. Program: La Luna Azul Register and RSVP at BrierCreek@pinotspalette.com Invite […]
item.content:encoded:
Event Title: (triangle) Nanny Night Out: Paint + Sip

Date and Time: March 3rd at 6:30 pm

Location: Pinot’s Palette, 10410 Moncreiffe Rd #101, Raleigh, NC 27617, USA

Description
Arrive at 6:30 pm so that we are on time for the program start at 7 pm.
Cost $35, payable to business.
Program: La Luna Azul

Register and RSVP at BrierCreek@pinotspalette.com

Invite your friends to this amazing Nanny Night Out and help pack the house with nothing but nannies by printing out these great invitations:

they assemble just like the postcards for National Nanny Training Day.
